text_block_list.text: Summer camp has started. An important season for horse girl. I've been doing everything I can to make sure no time is wasted.
A high-intensity training menu packed full of training. Followed with icing on the top a massage preparations.
The training itself proceeds smoothly, Since we share what we need to do with each other. Even so―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ――Ha.
I secretly fist pump for visible training results. I'm happy that I can do my work as a trainer without problem.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Thank you again for your assistance today. Now, I will go and change my clothes.
After the training is over, there are still things I can do.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, we're going to the festival, right? I wonder if they are serving carrot roast again this year?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I wonder if I should have eaten a little less for dinner. I tend to overeat when I eat out.
The training camp schedule is halfway over, and a summer festival will be held nearby today.
Many horse girl go out happily, but Daiichi Ruby will probably stay at the training camp.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san?
choice_data_list: I've prepared a place for study for you.

text_block_list.text: I tried to prepare an environment that is as close as possible to the school environment for her study time.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……There was such a quiet place in the training camp. And even desks and lights.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you for your consideration.
Do～on, the sound of fireworks can be heard from afar. It's almost time for the festival to end.
However, Daiichi Ruby, who is concentrating, doesn't seem to be able to hear the outside sounds.
When it finally time for break, I say the words I had prepared before.
choice_data_list: Why don't we go for a little walk?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Understood.
On the way, we pass by people returning from the festival. I think "Are you really okay you didn't go?", but I decide to not say it.
Some people may think that studying while everyone else is enjoying the festivities is too much. But―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Tranquility……
On an empty beach, we stood side by side looking up at the stars in the sky. The sound of the sea breeze feel pleasant to my ears.
choice_data_list: I heard the stars here are beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Indeed, it is a beautiful view.
Daiichi Ruby stay silent after saying that, but that's fine. Giving her Just a few minutes of distraction after training camp, that's the only thing I can do for her.
She continues her study on her own volition. Telling her to take more rest or to play around like eveyone else is not the right thing to do.
Born as a member of the "Noble family", she never averts her eyes from the heavy responsibility. All I can do as her trainer is to support her with all my might.
Summer constellations twinkle in the night sky. Shining red in the sky is the heart of the scorpion - Antares.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …………Ah, as expected.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Scorpion's Fire……
I thought I heard something from her, but before I could confirm it, Daiichi Ruby's appearance returned to normal.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: The night breeze cleared my head. I'm going to go back and prepare for tomorrow's training.
As soon as she said it, Daiichi Ruby turned on her heel. Perhaps this walk too was not necessary for her.
Did I cause trouble with my unnecessary suggestion? I was worried about that…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …I would like to be like that too.
Through the small back, I heard that one sentence.
I wasn't sure if she was referring to the star that she wanted to show me. It's just―
I feel like we got closer just a little bit. It was such a joyful evening.
